id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield record.

namespace.description: The area or group to which the metafield belongs.

key.description: The name that identifies the metafield.

value.description: The actual value of the metafield.

value_type.description: The type of data stored in the metafield value.

description.description: Additional information or notes about the metafield.

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the resource that owns the metafield.

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated.

owner_resource.description: The type of resource that owns the metafield.

type.description: The data type of the metafield value.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield in the Admin GraphQL API.

shop_url.description: The URL of the Shopify shop associated with the metafield.
